body_html: @mhusseinsh Well, in your first example, Python is located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\Shared\Python36_64. But in the second step, you checked the python instance in C:\Python36\. It seems PyTorch was installed in the first environment, but the PATH for the first python environment is not checked.

body: @mhusseinsh Well, in your first example, Python is located in `C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\Shared\Python36_64`. But in the second step, you checked the python instance in `C:\Python36\`. It seems PyTorch was installed in the first environment, but the PATH for the first python environment is not checked.
